verbose_text: When AML-12 cells were exposed to MCD medium and HepG2 cells were treated with palmitic acid, mitochondrial integrity was reduced as shown by decreased expression of MFN1 and increased expression of DRP1 and FIS1, concomitant with higher CXCR3 mRNA and protein levels and increased lipid accumulation, lipid peroxidation and production of inflammatory cytokines TNF-alpha and IL-6.
